doc.title: Gum Control
doc.plot: With a pulsating breath, the bubble expands. A second later, the trap is set. Another second later and pop! He's gone. Detective John Melby will stop at nothing to catch the mysterious gum Snapper who tantalizes, abuses and destroys every natural order of law against public gum chewing. The Snapper will stop at nothing from making Melby's city a sticky place to live.
